mutants.code:
def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return y & 0 | x ^ y

def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return (y | 0) ^ (x ^ y)

def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return y & 0 ^ (x | y)

def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return y & 1 ^ (x ^ y)

def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return y & -1 ^ (x ^ y)

def assign_x_to_y(x, y):
    """
    Assigns the value of variable x to variable y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The variable to be assigned to.

    Returns:
        int: The assigned value.
    """
    return y & 1 ^ (x ^ y)
